title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind:The 5th Kind Extended Edition
description:
by AdigitalMan
What is it about? This extends CLOSE ENCOUNTERS OF THE THIRD KIND with all the scenes from the 3 available versions including the available deleted scenes. 
Although differing in image and audio quality, this is the ultimate extended edition of the movie.

original Film name: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
new film name: Close Encounters of the Third Kind: The Fifth Kind Extended Edition
production studio: Columbia
faneditor: ADigitalMan
date original movie was created: 16. Nov 77
date fanedit was created: 22. Jan 08
original runtime: 135
new runtime: 164
time cut/added: 29 minutes added

Fanedit details: All scenes from all three versions have been assembled into one cut, 
plus eight additional deleted scenes of marginal quality

Additional information: Presents the most complete story attempted without resorting to alternate or redundant scenes

fanediting time: 3 days

DVD details:
static menu with audio
NTSC 16:9
Dolby Ac-3 surround sound

Persons involved: ADigitalMan
